alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 13 at 12:21AM CDT until May 16 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Texas, including the following county, Tom Green. * WHEN...Until 215 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1218 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a heavy band of rain moving across San Angelo. This may lead to continued urban and small stream flooding into the early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Angelo, O.c. Fisher Reservoir, Goodfellow Air Force Base, San Angelo State Park, Lake Nasworthy, Grape Creek, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Wall and Harriet. - This includes the following Low Water Crossings... Howard and Webster, Southwest Blvd and Loop 306, Jackson From Knickerbocker to South Bryant, College Hills and Millbrook, 300 block of North Archer, 1500 Block of Spaulding, Sul Ross At Red Arroyo Crossing, FM 1692 crossing Sales Branch, Huntington and Sunset and Huntington and Sunset. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
